item.title: 2025 Summer Omakase: Imaginary Numbers
item.description: Introduction We call the solution $i$ of the quadratic equation $x^{2} + 1 = 0$ an imaginary number in the sense of “a number in the imagination.” However, even before irrational numbers were accepted, numbers were essentially imagined entities.
